constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 77 (Tuesday, May 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GARAMENDI:
H.R. 2979.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clauses 3 and 18 of the U.S.
Constitution
[Page H2142]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

title: To amend the Water Infrastructure Finance and Innovation Act of 2014 with respect to the final maturity date of certain loans, and for other purposes.
